parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets flag texture.

If texture is "", flag is not drawn.<br>
Custom texture can be used, as long as it is in *.jpg format and has dimensions of 200×200px, or *.paa (<template><title>arma3</title></template> standard: 512×256px).

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> See [[Flag Textures]] for a list of all in-game flag textures.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> flag [[setFlagTexture]] texture

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> flag: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> texture: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_flagE [[setFlagTexture]] "\ca\misc\data\sever_vlajka.paa";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_flagW [[setFlagTexture]] "\ca\misc\data\usa_vlajka.paa";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>flag1 [[setFlagTexture]] "\A3\Data_F\Flags\Flag_red_CO.paa";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>customFlag [[setFlagTexture]] "myMissionFlag.paa";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <code>flagARMA3 [[setFlagTexture]] "\a3\ui_f\data\Logos\arma3_expansion_ca.paa";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x6</name>=<value> Capturable OPFOR flag:<code>[[private]] _flag = "FlagPole_F" [[createVehicle]] [[position]] [[player]];
_flag [[setFlagTexture]] "\A3\Data_F\Flags\Flag_CSAT_CO.paa";
_flag [[setFlagSide]] [[east]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[flag]], [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[forceFlagTexture]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]]

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags
</value></part></template>
